history.content: The software is already installed on the lab computers (for at least 61B), but you should ask in the 186 Piazza if they have a particular configuration or setup process.

I spilled water on my laptop, and some of the keys aren't working and I don't know when the entire thing might fail.

Unfortunately, I have a project in CS186 ( databases ) that wants us to use IntelliJ, and it's due Tuesday October 4th for extra credit.

Planned on working entirely in Soda labs for the project, but our accounts don't have sudo permissions to install everything.

I also only have had Windows laptops, so I'm not very familiar to Unix environments... I don't even know what to do after extracting a targz file to open it, so I wasn't able to install linuxbrew.

I'm really not able to afford a new laptop until winter break. Databases piazza  suggested using Eclipse, since Maven comes with it. But I'm still unable to run any tests in terminal since Maven isn't installed on the computers and I'm also a beginner at Eclipse and more familiar with IntelliJ. 

Need help ASAP, thanks!
history.subject: Is there a way to install Java 7 , IntelliJ , and Maven on the soda lab machines?

history.content:
I spilled water on my laptop, and some of the keys aren't working and I don't know when the entire thing might fail.

Unfortunately, I have a project in CS186 ( databases ) that wants us to use IntelliJ, and it's due Tuesday October 4th for extra credit.

Planned on working entirely in Soda labs for the project, but our accounts don't have sudo permissions to install everything.

I also only have had Windows laptops, so I'm not very familiar to Unix environments... I don't even know what to do after extracting a targz file to open it, so I wasn't able to install linuxbrew.

I'm really not able to afford a new laptop until winter break. Databases piazza  suggested using Eclipse, since Maven comes with it. But the instructions are written assuming you're using IntelliJ, and I'm still unable to run any tests in terminal since Maven isn't installed on the computers. 

Need help ASAP, thanks!
